headline: Trump's Stranglehold on the GOP Isn't Loosening Anytime Soon
author: Paul Blest

Former President Donald Trump is pushing back on efforts from some leading Republicans to break his stranglehold on the direction of the GOP, saying on Sunday and Monday that his endorsement has allowed those Republicans to gain and remain in powereven though those same Republicans have been in power for years.
